coreQueryPageProvider.name: CATEGORIES_LIST_PP
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVCategory where ecm:isTrashed = 0 and ecm:isVersion = 0

coreQueryPageProvider.name: CATEGORIES_LIST_PUBLIC_ONLY_PP
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM FVCategory where ecm:isTrashed = 0 and ecm:isVersion = 0 and ecm:isProxy = 1 and ecm:path STARTSWITH '/FV/sections/'

coreQueryPageProvider.name: CATEGORY_CHILDREN_PP
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document where ecm:isTrashed = 0 and ecm:isVersion = 0 and ecm:ancestorId = ?
